name: reducer-registry
description: Javascript library for building switchless reducer
author: Robus Gauli

scripts.build: export dir=$(pwd) pkg=$(node -p "require('./package').distName"); npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.create: npm run build && git commit -am $msg && git tag -s $msg -m $msg && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release: env msg=$(npm run -s message) npm run create && npm publish --access public
